name: Earth Group Services
overview:
Earth Lingua, established in 2006 is a reputed translation company in India, provides excellent services related to language. This Delhi based company has earned its own name and fame by its dedication and commitment for its clients. It specializes in a full range of high-quality language interpretation services, from translation of a one-page birth certificate to the coordination of multi-language, multi-venue simultaneous interpretation services for national conferences with thousands of national delegates. Our professional attitude towards our clients has made us a trust worthy name in the market.

At Earth Lingua, we pay maximum attention to our customers. We care for them very much and place great importance in finding out what they need, what they think about us, what we do and how should we work by which the bond between we and our customers can be stronger. This approach has helped us to build strong, long-lasting relationships and enabled us to deliver unrivalled customer service in the translation and interpreting industry. We regularly seek the feedback of our customers by which we can improve the quality of our service. This helps us making the necessary improvements to our services and we develop our staff constructively in the right way.
